bug.summary: autodoc_mock_imports should mock genicam but not genicam2.
bug.description:
Describe the bug In conf.py, autodoc_mock_imports refers to genicam2 but it's obsolete. Expected behavior It must refer to genicam instead. Desktop (please complete the following information):
